name: Flow Water Games
description:
Dive into the critical thinking and become a plumber of the crazy extreme level. Put your brain to the trial in this puzzle game, repair the pipes and become the champion of plumbing.

HOW TO PLAY：
We think this game is perfect for the person who like to solve problems for others! Setting up a messy pipe system to get the water supply to your city, until the pressure break it all and water to get leak into the crowdy city! So you have to save your city from being drowned. Now that everything is completely messed up, you’ll have to solve this problem by sliding the wrong pipes away and make the correct pipeline between the two last points which are fixed in a place.

Features:
->Hint is integrated to help you solve the problem,
->Tutorial screen will teach you how to play,
->Solve the puzzle in a less to time to get more stars,
->Nice graphics with cool animations,
->Its Freely available to play,
->Now you can get rid of the ads in just a single buck!

Enjoy the Flow Water Games Mania!!!
